instruction2: Copy the meta tag below and add it within your website's HEAD tag.
instructionHtmlText: 1. Sign in to the administrator account of the following website: {{ url }} 2. Copy the following meta tag and add it within your website's <head> tag: {{ value }} 3. Save the changes you made in that file. 4. Inform your client that you already made the update to the website.
pasteContents: Paste the contents into an email and send it to your web developer's email address.
notSure: Not sure how to do it?
doTheFollowing: If for some reason, you can't follow the steps above, do the following:

detail.label: Fill in site information
detail.description: Add the name and url of your site to start the process.

howToSetup.headline: How to add site
howToSetup.subHeadline: Watch this video to see how to install the meta tag onto your site.
